org.spongepowered.api.service.scheduler

Interface SchedulerQuery

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AsynchronousScheduler, SynchronousScheduler

    public interface SchedulerQuery
    Examples of how to setup the use of the Scheduler are included in the API descriptions in this interface.
    See Also:
    AsynchronousScheduler.runTask(Object, Runnable), AsynchronousScheduler.runTaskAfter(Object, Runnable, java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit, long), AsynchronousScheduler.runRepeatingTask(Object, Runnable, java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit, long),

    Examples of how to setup the use of the Scheduler are included in the API descriptions in this interface.

    , SynchronousScheduler.runTask(Object, Runnable), SynchronousScheduler.runTaskAfter(Object, Runnable, long), SynchronousScheduler.runRepeatingTask(Object, Runnable, long), SynchronousScheduler.runRepeatingTaskAfter(Object, Runnable, long, long)

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Collection<Task> getScheduledTasks()
      Returns a collection of all currently scheduled tasks.
      java.util.Collection<Task> getScheduledTasks(java.lang.Object plugin)
      Returns a collection of all currently scheduled tasks owned by a certain plugin.

      Retrieves a scheduled or running task by its unique ID.

      Returns a collection of Tasks that match the Regular Expression pattern.

      Gets the UUID of the task by name.

    • Method Detail

      • getTaskById

        com.google.common.base.Optional<Task> getTaskById(java.util.UUID id)
        Retrieves a scheduled or running task by its unique ID.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the task
        Returns:
        The scheduled or running task, or Optional.absent()

      • getUuidOfTaskByName

        com.google.common.base.Optional<java.util.UUID> getUuidOfTaskByName(java.lang.String name)
        Gets the UUID of the task by name.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the task to search
        Returns:
        The Optional<UUID> result from the search by name.

      • getTasksByName

        java.util.Collection<Task> getTasksByName(java.lang.String pattern)
        Returns a collection of Tasks that match the Regular Expression pattern.

        If no tasks match the pattern, the collection is Optional.absent()

        If there are Tasks that match the regular expression pattern, the Collection is not Optional.absent().

        Parameters:
        pattern - The regular expression pattern applied to the name of tasks.
        Returns:
        Collection of Tasks that have names that match the pattern.

      • getScheduledTasks

        java.util.Collection<Task> getScheduledTasks()
        Returns a collection of all currently scheduled tasks.
        Returns:
        A collection of scheduled tasks

      • getScheduledTasks

        java.util.Collection<Task> getScheduledTasks(java.lang.Object plugin)
        Returns a collection of all currently scheduled tasks owned by a certain plugin.
        Parameters:
        plugin - The plugin to return tasks created by
        Returns:
        A collection of scheduled tasks
